sources.title: Voodoo Man (1944) Bela Lugosi high quality print
sources.description: A mad doctor (Bela Lugosi) and his helpers (John Carradine, George Zucco) lure girls to his lab for brain work, to help his wife.

sources.title: SCARY NIGHT AT THE BIJOU (double feature)
sources.description: A simulated double feature program at a second-run movie house in the 1940s: Our night of spooky mayhem begins with previews of coming attractions and a cartoon followed by Bela Lugosi, George Zucco, John Carradine and a bevy of girl zombies in "Voodoo Man." Next Mantan Moreland becomes leader of a squad of the undead in one of the top-rated B-genre films the 4-star "King of the Zombies."

metadata.Plot: Dr. Richard Marlowe uses a combination of voodoo rite and hypnotic suggestion, attempting to revive his beautiful, but long-dead, wife, by transferring the life essences of several hapless young girls he has kidnapped and imprisoned in the dungeon beneath his mansion.
metadata.Actors: Bela Lugosi, John Carradine, George Zucco
